Title: The Mom & Pop Store
Plot: A salesman convinces George to buy a convertible once owned by "Jon Voight." Kramer tries to save a small shoe-repair business, but his good intentions affect Jerry in a big way. Elaine wins tickets for Mr. Pitt, who's always wanted to participate in the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade.
GuestStars: Ian Abercrombie, Bryan Cranston, Jon Voight, Elsa Raven, Michael Robello, Tom Wright, Ken Thorley, Dan Frischman, Rick Fitts, Nancy Balbirer, Pat Asanti, Steve Brady, Matt Gallini
